app_descript:
App Name: Figurine Art
Package Name: com.hcg.figurineart

Brief:

Unleash your creativity with Figurine Art, an engaging mobile experience where the world of action figures meets the finesse of a paint studio. Tailor-make your superhero action figures from assembly to the finishing touches of paint. Flaunt your skills in color shading, texturizing, and designing to bring realism to each figure. Manage your idle factory, attract clientele to your toy store, and become the ultimate DIY Toy Maker as you monetize your masterpieces and proceed to greater heights.
